elements.title: "beef" between Kendrick Lamar and Drake (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the "beef" between Kendrick Lamar and Drake (both pictured) dates back to the 2013 song "Control"?

elements.title: The Sign (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Bluey special "The Sign" reminded a Sydney Morning Herald reporter of Australia's housing crisis?

elements.title: Joel Breman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joel Breman, who helped combat the 1976 Ebola virus outbreak in Zaire, was not expected to return alive by the pilots who dropped him there?

elements.title: St. Trinitatis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Lutheran St. Trinitatis in Wolfenbüttel, consecrated in 1719, is a Baroque church with a facade recalling that of a palace?

elements.title: Marcus Jacob Papilaja (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that to mitigate religious violence in the city, Ambon mayor Marcus Jacob Papilaja made Muslim and Christian city employees mix?

elements.title: Vulcan Bridge (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Vulcan Bridge, a bridge in Vulcan, West Virginia, was constructed after the mayor requested financial aid from the Soviet Union?

elements.title: Strategion (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while going to the Strategion in Constantinople, Emperor Theodosius II was attacked with stones by a hungry mob?

elements.title: Matthew Charles Johnson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during the "trial from hell" Matthew Charles Johnson and his co-accused hurled abuse at the judge and threw human excrement at a member of the jury?
